quotes.quote: Badges? We ain't got no badges! We don't need no badges! I don't have to show you any stinking badges!
quotes.author: The Treasure of the Sierra Mad

quotes.quote: 如果你浪费了自己的年龄，那是挺可悲的。因为你的青春只能持续一点儿时间——很短的一点儿时间。
quotes.author: 王尔德

quotes.quote: When you do the common things in life in an uncommon way, you will command the attention of the world.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.quote: 这世界要是没有爱情，它在我们心中还会有什么意义！这就如一盏没有亮光的走马灯。
quotes.author: 歌德

quotes.quote: Give me a museum and I'll fill it.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: All are lunatics, but he who can analyze his delusion is called a philosopher.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: 这世界要是没有爱情，它在我们心中还会有什么意义！这就如一盏没有亮光的走马灯。
quotes.author: 歌德

quotes.quote: Carpe diem. Seize the day, boys. Make your lives extraordinary.
quotes.author: Dead Poets Society

quotes.quote: I think 'Hail to the Chief' has a nice ring to it.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Tell 'em to go out there with all they got and win just one for the Gipper.
quotes.author: Knute Rockne All American

quotes.quote: I've had a wonderful time, but this wasn't it.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: 理想是人生的太阳。
quotes.author: 德莱赛

quotes.quote: 友谊是一棵可以庇荫的树。
quotes.author: 柯尔律治

quotes.quote: If you build it, he will come.
quotes.author: Field of Dreams

quotes.quote: A friendship founded on business is better than a business founded on friendship.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: If you can count your money, you don't have a billion dollars.
quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

quotes.quote: 没有人不爱惜他的生命，但很少人珍视他的时间。
quotes.author: 梁实秋

quotes.quote: We didn't lose the game; we just ran out of time.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: You've got to ask yourself one question: 'Do I feel lucky?' Well, do ya, punk?
quotes.author: Dirty Harry

quotes.quote: Keep your friends close, but your enemies closer.
quotes.author: The Godfather II

quotes.quote: Elementary, my dear Watson.
quotes.author: The Adventures of Sherlock Hol

quotes.quote: Whenever I climb I am followed by a dog called 'Ego'.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: 我读的书愈多，就愈亲近世界，愈明了生活的意义，愈觉得生活的重要。
quotes.author: 高尔基

quotes.quote: Give me a museum and I'll fill it.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: 相信谎言的人必将在真理之前毁灭。
quotes.author: 赫尔巴特

quotes.quote: 时间是由分秒积成的，善于利用零星时间的人，才会做出更大的成绩来。
quotes.author: 华罗庚

quotes.quote: 温顺的青年人在图书馆里长大，他们相信他们的责任是应当接受西塞罗，洛克，培根发表的意见；他们忘了西塞罗，洛克与培根写这些书的时候，也不过是在图书馆里的青年人
quotes.author: 爱默生

quotes.quote: 千军易得，一将难求。
quotes.author: 马致远
